==3.2 Apollo Web Service==
==3.3 Apollo Client Web Service==
Implementation of an Apollo Client Web Service requires implementing the following methods.
||*return value*||*method name*||*parameters*||
||int runId||run||{ModelType}RunRequestObjType||
||{ModelType}RunResponseObjType||getResults||int runId||
||RunStatusEnum||getStatus||int runId||
||SupportedTypeCollectionType||getUnregisteredParametersDescription||||
||{ModelType}RunRequestObjType||getDefaultRunParametersObj||||
||String description||getModelDescription||||

Note 1: Replace {ModelType} with the type of model that the web service is exposing.  (e.g. for an AgentBased model, {ModelType}RunRequestObjType would be renamed AgentBasedRunRequestObjType)

Note 2: Non-native classes are defined by this specification.  See Chapter 4 for a description of the non-native classes.
